pages.title: Ender Catalyst
pages.text: A catalyst extracted from the soul of the mobs that roam the End. List of valid mobs: Endermen, Endermites and Shulkers.
Complete the Catalyst by absorbing the correct souls, until the process is finished and the Catalyst appears.
When used in a Runic Artifact, an Ender Catalyst produces End Materia. End Materia can be consumed for experience or transformed into Chorus Fruit, End Rod, Ender Pearl, End Stone or Shulker Shell.
